comments.text:
Created attachment 513340
xpcshell testcase

I discovered this by stack inspection.  Basically, if you have a binary input stream that hasn't had its input stream set yet, and you tell it this:

stream.setInputStream(stream]);

Then any call to stread.Read() will lead to a stack overflow.
comments.author: ajvincent@gmail.com
